contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox musical artist | name = Vesania | background = group_or_band | image = Vesania 0001.jpg | caption = Vesania, 2011 | origin = [[Legionowo]], [[Poland]] | genre = [[Symphonic black metal]], [[blackened death metal]] | years_active = 1997–present | label = [[Napalm Records|Napalm]]<ref>http://www.roadrunnerrecords.com/blabbermouth.net/news.aspx?mode=Article&newsitemID=36608</ref><br />Empire | associated_acts = [[Behemoth (band)|Behemoth]]<br>[[Dimmu Borgir]]<br>[[Rootwater]]<br>[[UnSun]]<br>[[Vader (band)|Vader]]<br>[[Black River (band)|Black River]]<br>Mortis Dei<br>Neolithic<br>Sammath Naur | website = | current_members = [[Tomasz Wróblewski|Orion]]<br>[[Filip Hałucha|Heinrich]]<br>[[Dariusz Brzozowski|Daray]]<br>[[Krzysztof Oloś|Siegmar]]<br>[[Marcin Walenczykowski|Valeo]] | notable_instruments = }} '''Vesania''' ([[Latin]] for [[insanity]]) is a [[Poland|Polish]] [[symphonic black metal]]/[[blackened death metal]] band. They were formed in 1997 by [[Tomasz Wróblewski|Orion]], [[Dariusz Brzozowski|Daray]], and Heinrich.<ref>http://www.musicmight.com/artist/poland/legionowo/vesania</ref> Later members were Annahvahr and Hatrah, who left the band in 1999 and was replaced by Siegmar. Their first album, ''Moonastray'', was a split with Black Altar, released in 2002 by Odium Records, exclusively in Poland. The release was limited to 666 copies and each album was signed with blood. 2003 saw the release across Europe of their first full length album, ''Firefrost Arcanum'', by Empire Records. This was followed by the departure of band member Annahvahr. Their second album ''God the Lux'' was released in April, 2005, and shortly thereafter Valeo (Sammath Naur, Mortis Dei) joined the band as lead guitarist.<ref>http://www.roadrunnerrecords.com/blabbermouth.net/news.aspx?mode=Article&newsitemID=38252</ref><ref>http://www.roadrunnerrecords.com/blabbermouth.net/news.aspx?mode=Article&newsitemID=40392</ref> Their third album, ''Distractive Killusions'', was released in 2007 on Napalm Records, from which came their first single ''Rage of Reason''. The vocals include screaming and low growling.<ref>http://www.roadrunnerrecords.com/blabbermouth.net/news.aspx?mode=Article&newsitemID=81852</ref> ==Members== ===Current members=== * [[Tomasz Wróblewski|Tomasz "Orion" Wróblewski]] – guitar, vocals (1997–present) * [[Dariusz Brzozowski|Dariusz "Daray" Brzozowski]] – drums and percussion (1997–present) * [[Filip Hałucha|Filip "Heinrich" Hałucha]] – bass guitar (1997–present) * Krzysztof "Siegmar" Oloś – keyboard (2000–present) * Marcin "Valeo" Walenczykowski – guitar (2005–present) ===Former members=== * Hatrah – keyboards (1998–1999) * Filip "Annahvahr" Żołyński – guitar, vocals (1998–2003) ==Discography== ;Studio albums * ''[[Firefrost Arcanum]]'' (2003) * ''[[God the Lux]]'' (2005) * ''[[Distractive Killusions]]'' (2007) ;Split albums * ''Moonastray'' (2002) ;Demos * ''Reh (Tape)'' (1997) * ''CD Promo 1999'' (1999) ;Singles * ''[[Rage of Reason]]'' (2008) == References == <references/> ==External links== {{commons|Vesania|Vesania}} * [http://www.vesania.pl Vesania's Official web site] * {{myspace|godthelux|Vesania}} * [http://www.youtube.com/user/tanzteufel Vesania] at [[Youtube]] {{Vesania}} [[Category:Polish musical groups]] [[Category:Polish heavy metal musical groups]] [[Category:Polish black metal musical groups]] [[Category:Blackened death metal musical groups]] [[Category:Symphonic black metal musical groups]] [[Category:Musical groups established in 1997]] {{Poland-band-stub}}
